sub_title: Solution/API Architect ✰ Certified TOGAF, Archimate, MuleSoft Architect
summary:
✉ : tanimdacoder@gmail.com

Comprehensive experience in architecture, development, consulting and leading team to telecommunications/e-commerce/financial companies in multidisciplinary projects with two business attributes Experience and Enthusiasm, working on business and system implementation projects such as business(HR/Finance/Procurement/Financial leasing) process design, ESB, API management, mediation, ETL, provisioning & activation, fraud prevention.

Specialties:
TOGAF/Archimate
MuleSoft, Google Apigee, Azure APIM, Axway, WSO2, Oracle Integration Cloud
J2EE, Python
CICD (Jenkins, Artifactory, Azure DevOps, Vagrant, Git, Maven)
Mediation
Service Activation & Provisioning
Customer relationship management
Solution Delivery
Project management
Familiarity with general TM Forum eTOM concepts

Mediation systems expertise: Intec Intermediate.
Fulfillment/Provisioning systems expertise: Comptel/Nokia InstantLink, Intec InterActivate, In-house Service Activation
Familiar with network elements and IN equipment from among others: Nokia, Ericsson, Huawei, Alcatel, Comviva.

Clients include:
FinTech
• De Lage Landen (part of Rabo Bank)

System integrators and ISVs
• IBM
• Summit Communications

Telecom operators
• KPN, Netherlands
• Telenor, Bangladesh (GrameenPhone)
• Robi Axiata, Bangladesh
• T-Mobile, CZ
• Hutchison, HongKong

E-Commerce/Retail
• Rakuten, Japan
• Tony Chocolonely, Netherlands

Government
• Bangladesh Navy

CCV	                                    MML/Telnet
